Package org.linqs.psl.model.atom

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AtomEvent.Listener
    A listener for AtomEvents.
    AtomManager
    Provides centralization and hooks for managing the GroundAtoms that are instantiated from a Database.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Atom
    A Predicate combined with the correct number of Terms as arguments.
    AtomCache
    Storage for GroundAtoms so that a Database always returns the same object for a GroundAtom.
    AtomEvent
    An event related to a RandomVariableAtom.
    AtomEventFramework
    AtomManager with support for AtomEvents.
    GroundAtom
    An Atom with only GroundTerms for arguments.
    ObservedAtom
    A GroundAtom with a fixed truth value and a confidence value of infinity.
    PersistedAtomManager
    Implements the AtomManager with a twist: this AtomManager will only return RandomVariableAtoms that were persisted in the Database at instantiation.
    QueryAtom
    An Atom that can be used in a query, but does not have a truth value or confidence value.
    RandomVariableAtom
    A GroundAtom with a truth value and a confidence value which can be modified.
    SimpleAtomManager
    AtomManager that does not provide any functionality beyond passing calls to underlying components.
    VariableAssignment
    Maintains a mapping from Variables to GroundTerms, i.e.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AtomEvent.Type
    Types of AtomEvents
